title: Brooklyn-Made Stubblr Launches Mobile App to Change the Way Fans Buy and Sell Sports, Concert and Theater Tickets
text:
Stubblr eliminates the barriers between buyers and sellers. The app combines geo-location, social components and real-time messaging to enable safe, secure transactions.
Brooklyn, NY (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
Stubblr is empowering sports, concert and Broadway fans with a new mobile ticketing app that transforms the way users find, buy and sell tickets.
The Stubblr app for iOS combines geo-location and social components to help fans safely and easily find buyers and sellers of last-minute tickets near their location.
The game-changing, mobile-first app is made by fans, for fans. Stubblr was developed by avid sports and live music fans, Co-Founders Steven Rosenberg and Paul Yankowitz.
Yankowitz said: “We were tired of the practices and limitations of online ticketing platforms and having to deal with scalpers. We knew there had to be a better way, and thought we could combine the immediacy and transparency of apps like Uber and Airbnb to create a mobile-first ticketing platform.”
“Our vision for Stubblr is to tear down the barriers established by traditional marketplaces, and create a safe environment that empowers buyers and sellers to transact directly in real-time. “
Users are already embracing the new approach, awarding Stubblr with dozens of 5-star reviews in the App store.
The app is available now for iOS with an Android version to shortly follow.
STUBBLR FEATURES
Post ticket requests and deals
Find buyers and sellers around you with geo location
Instantly chat with users to negotiate and transact
Social profiles for verification
Digital payments and buyer ticket validation
Download Stubblr from the App Store: http://bit.ly/stubblr
